extends java.lang.Object
    This JEuroTournament object represents the class system

    Java Course Team 2012, University Of Haifa-Israel

      • addMatchResult

        public boolean addMatchResult(java.lang.String tIdA,
                     java.lang.String tIdB,
                     java.lang.String mId,
                     java.util.Date date,
                     int totalTime,
                     int tAgoals,
                     int tBgoals,
                     boolean penaltyEnd,
                     short tAYellowCards,
                     short tBYellowCards,
                     short tARedcards,
                     short tBRedcards)
        the method ad a Match result that occurred between two teams, Team A and Team B. in addition the result details. first search for the teams and match if they exist, create the match result object and then add it to the proper objects.
        Parameters:
        tIdA -
        tIdB -
        mId -
        totalTime -
        tAgoals -
        tBgoals -
        penaltyEnd -
        Returns:
        if successfully added match result to both match the the involved teams

      • eliteTeamsArrangedByGoalsGap

        public Team[] eliteTeamsArrangedByGoalsGap(int gap)
        elite teams are defined as teams with total goals gap (in-out) bigger or equals to the parameter gap that is received to this method

        then the method arrange the teams according to this gap from highest to lowest

        notice: if two teams have the same goals gap then the are compared according to the total fans number of each team.

        Returns:
        Team[] contains the elite teams arrange by goals gap, number of fans

      • getXDiffirentPlayerWithOneSkill

        public Player[] getXDiffirentPlayerWithOneSkill(int X)
        the method searches the players for total of X player that has exactly one skill from every team.
        Returns:
        Player[] Array of X player from every team sorted by team representation country.

      • InterestFunding

        public Fund[] InterestFunding(int total)
        Interest funding is a fund which was give from a sponsor to a team that represents his(sponsor) country
        Returns:
        Fund[] that contains Interest funds

      • getTeamsFundAndTotal

        public java.lang.String[] getTeamsFundAndTotal()
        the method return an array of strings where each string is a combination of three raws

        first row is the team

        second row indicates if the team received fund

        third row shows the Amount of received fund

        Warning: the use of String.format() is compulsory(must)

        NOT USING IT WILL CAUSE LOSING POINT

        Returns:
        String[] that contains Objects as indicated above

      • extendedMatcheswithoutPenaltyKicks

        public MatchResult[] extendedMatcheswithoutPenaltyKicks()
        the method search for all matches where the time was extended but the game was over before getting to the penalty stage.
        Returns:
        MatchResult[] that contains objects that satisfy the above.

      • getAllTeamsInvolvedInExtendedMatches

        public Team[] getAllTeamsInvolvedInExtendedMatches()
        the method return all teams that participant at least once in an extended Match that ends before the penalty stage use the method:
        Returns:
        Team[] that participant in the extended matches
        See Also:
        extendedMatcheswithoutPenaltyKicks()
